title: Ticket #1869: Condor-C doesn't set JobLeaseDuration
description:
When the gridmanager constructs the new job ad for a Condor-C job, it doesn't set JobLeaseDuration. When this attribute isn't set for shadow-based job, then most semantics of a job lease are disabled between the shadow and starter. If the connection between the two daemons breaks, no reconnect is attempted.

The gridmanager should set JobLeaseDuration to the default value of 20 minutes if remote_JobLeaseDuration doesn't appear in the original ad.
